PORT 202 Intermediate Portuguese (5) VLPA
Modern texts, compositions, conversation, and a systematic review of grammar. Second in a sequence of three.

PORT 203 Intermediate Portuguese (5) VLPA
Modern texts, compositions, conversation, and a systematic review of grammar. Third in a sequence of three.

PORT 201 Intermediate Portuguese (5) VLPA
Modern texts, compositions, conversation, and a systematic review of grammar. First in a sequence of three.

PORT 101 Elementary Portuguese (5)
Methods and objectives are primarily oral-aural. Covers all major elements of Portuguese grammar. First in a sequence of three.
View course details in MyPlan: PORT 101

PORT 103 Elementary Portuguese (5)
Methods and objectives are primarily oral-aural. Covers all major elements of Portuguese grammar. Third in a sequence of three.

PORT 102 Elementary Portuguese (5)
Methods and objectives are primarily oral-aural. Covers all major elements of Portuguese grammar. Second in a sequence of three.

PORT 302 Advanced Portuguese (5) VLPA
Develops writing techniques and strategies for the production of Portuguese texts of an academic and professional nature.

PORT 301 Advanced Portuguese (5) VLPA
Emphasizes oral skills while continuing to refine reading comprehension and written expression. Aims to develop abilities to successfully deal with comprehension and production of oral texts of an academic and professional nature. Not a conversation course.
